# Contagion (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Disease Spells|disease]], [[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Adept Spells|Adept 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Corruption (Domain)|Corruption 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 259

The subject contracts one of the following diseases: [[Blinding Sickness|blinding sickness]], [[Bubonic Plague|bubonic plague]], [[Cackle Fever|cackle fever]], [[Filth Fever|filth fever]], [[Leprosy|leprosy]], [[Mindfire|mindfire]], [[Red Ache|red ache]], [[Shakes|shakes]], or [[Slimy Doom|slimy doom]]. The disease is contracted immediately (the onset period does not apply). Use the diseaseâ€™s listed frequency and save DC to determine further effects.

**GM Note**

Added disease descriptor per *Ultimate Magic*.

*House Rule:* Added Corruption 3 to Level per *Fiendish Codex I.*
